sp: 1.1.1 Read, say and write any numbers up to 10 000 000.
1.1.2 Represent numbers up to 10 000 000 and determine the number patterns.
1.1.3 Read, say and write any numbers up to 10 000 000 in fraction of a million with 2, 4, 5, 8 and 10 as the denominators involving daily situations.
1.1.4 Read, say and write any numbers up to 10 000 000 in decimal of a million up to three decimal places involving daily situations.
1.1.5 Convert numbers in decimal of a million and fraction of a million to whole number and vice versa.
1.2.1 Solve basic operations and mixed operations number sentences involving whole numbers, fraction of a million and decimal of a million with and without brackets including the use of unknown.
1.3.1 Classify numbers within 100 to prime numbers and composite numbers.

1.4.1 Solve daily routine problems involving whole numbers, prime numbers, composite numbers, fraction of a million and decimal of a million for basic operations and mixed operations, with and without brackets including the use of unknown.
objektif: By the end of the lesson, pupils will be able to Read, say and write any numbers up to 10 000 000. correctly.
By the end of the lesson, pupils will be able to Read, say and write any numbers up to 10 000 000. with guidance.

aktiviti.text: Teacher displays flashcards to stimulate interest.
Teacher introduces new vocabulary using picture cards.
Pupils work in groups for a 'Gallery Walk' activity.
Pupils complete the comprehension worksheet individually.
Teacher summarizes the lesson key points.

Pupils construct sentences using the new vocabulary.
Teacher summarizes the lesson key points.
